patterns: How do I apply for admissions?
Do I need an entrance exam?
When is the application deadline for B.Tech?
responses: You can apply online through our university portal. Admissions for the next semester open on December 15th.
Admission requirements vary by program. Generally, you need a high school diploma with a minimum GPA of 3.0 and SAT/ACT scores. Check the 'Admissions' page on our website for details.
The application deadline for the fall semester is July 31st.

patterns: Do you have a Computer Science program?
What specializations are available in B.Tech?
Can I get a course catalog?
What is the curriculum for CSE?
responses: We offer a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs, including B.Tech in Computer Science (with specializations in AI/ML and Cybersecurity), B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, and B.Sc in Physics.
You can find a complete list of all our programs and their detailed curriculum on the 'Academics' section of the university website.

patterns: How much is the tuition fee?
Can I get a fee waiver?
responses: Tuition fees are $1,500 per semester for B.Tech programs. Additional hostel fees are $500 per semester.
Yes, we offer several merit-based and need-based scholarships. The deadline to apply for scholarships is August 15th. You can find eligibility criteria on the 'Scholarships' page.

patterns: What is the hostel mess like?
responses: Yes, we have separate on-campus hostel facilities for boys and girls with 24/7 security, Wi-Fi, and laundry services.
Our dorms are well-maintained and include options for single and shared rooms. You can find more details and apply for a room on the 'Hostel' section of our portal.

patterns: How to get to the campus?
responses: Our university is located at 123 University Drive, Tech City, 40001.
You can find a campus map and driving directions on the 'Contact Us' page of our website.

responses: You can reach the admissions office at (123) 456-7890 or by email at ditniversity@edu.in
For general inquiries, please call our main office at (123) 456-7800.

patterns: What are the upcoming events on campus?

responses: Our annual tech fest 'Innovate 2025' is scheduled for November 15th-17th.
You can find a full calendar of campus events, workshops, and sports meets on the 'Events' section of our website.

responses: The central library is open from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM on weekdays and 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM on weekends.
